name: Pap3r
description:
[DESCRIPTION]

A game where you are a stickman who is in a world made out of paper. However, you get to draw in the air.  

I am planning on making this game into a puzzle-platformer game where you have to solve puzzles using your ability to draw in the world.

(NOTE: THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE AND IS FAR FROM DONE, PLEASE EXPECT BUGS)
